generatetableofcontents.description: Generates a table of contents (anchor links) from headings.

attributes.name: Variable name that stores the array of nested lists (default is 'generated_table_of_contents').
attributes.prefix: Prefix of the ID attribute added to the heading tag (default is 'anchor').
attributes.add_html: If specified, the table of contents list and the content with the ID will be concatenated and output.
